location.proximity: 2 minutes walk from Wandsworth Common and Clapham Common
location.description: Located just off the Northcote Road in South London, with easy access to Wimbledon Common, Richmond Park, Battersea Park and the river Thames. Many cafes, restaurants, shops & entertainment nearby. Clapham Junction train and Clapham South Tube station are both a 10 min walk away.

house.description: Ground floor is all on one level with an open plan kitchen leading onto the garden and linking through to the study/piano area and main Sitting Room. There is a downstairs loo and laundry room and a cool open plan tanked cellar for storage.

rooms.kitchen: Open plan kitchen leading to garden
rooms.sitting_room: Main sitting room with study/piano area
rooms.bathroom: Upstairs shower room and separate bathroom

pets.name: Isla
pets.description: Half human, very friendly and loves company

needs.additional: Needs letting out for a wee during the day

pets.name: Pomme
pets.description: Independent but very friendly, has a surrogate family a couple of doors down

needs.medication: daily Fortekor 2.5mg tablet for kidney condition
needs.behavior: independent, likes to go outside through cat flap or open window
needs.water: Prefers to find his own water or use the tap rather than drinking from a bowl

feedback: This was such a lovely sit! The family was sweet and hospitable, making sure I felt right at home.
Isla is very much a velcro dog and loves to get all the attention. Pomme was very independent but the sweetest and most well mannered boy.
The house is in a fantastic location—right at the bottom of Northcote Road, offering easy access to lovely cafés, delis, and so much more.

garden.description: small garden with patio and outdoor dining area
